about_the_game:
This package contains all original soundtracks composed by Jozef Sarissky and extras from the development of City Climber.

The City Climber Original Soundtrack

  • 1. Beginnings
  • 2. Tempo
  • 3. City
  • 4. Void
  • 5. Ascend

Extras

  • Gameplay video and screenshots from early prototype of City Climber
  • Images of our Steam Emoticons, Badges, Backgrounds, Trading Cards and Achievements
  • Videos and screenshots from early stages of development
  • Greenlight trailer
  • Timelapse of creating the "Broken Bones" level
  • Screenshot comparisons showing how did the game change during 1 year of development
...and much more!

How to access the files

All files will be placed into your local City Climber folder:

...\Steam\steamapps\common\CityClimber\Soundtrack
...\Steam\steamapps\common\CityClimber\Extras

name: City Climber - Soundtrack & Extras
short_description: This package contains all original soundtracks composed by Jozef Sarissky and various material from the development of City Climber.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Czech
